g.text: The communication between the Agent Manager and the Ankaios Server is simpliefied here. The actuall calls go over the Communication Middleware.
general steps of handling the UpdateWorkload command
[first update workload call for the current agent execution]
finds existing workloads for that runtime
[found running workload is identical to required workload]
[found running workload is not required anymore]
[remaining added workloads not found in the list of running workloads]
see add workload digram for details
see dedicated digram for susequent calls
